segments.text: Can we have two tickets for the 7:30 showing of ' Beautiful Mind ' .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , we have sold out the tickets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's on tomorrow at that time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ' Beautiful Mind ' will be playing again . And there's also ' Titanic ' .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Terrific , that's a wonderful movie , I like it very much . Can I get tickets now for tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1
